to_address: Clerk of Court United States District Court Southern District of New York The undersigned attorney respectfully requests that the Clerk note his appearance in this case as counsel for the United States of America and add him as a Filing User to whom Notices of Electronic Filing will be transmitted in this case.
body:
July 21, 2025
Respectfully submitted,
JAY CLAYTON
United States Attorney for the
Southern District of New York
By: /s/ Jeffrey Oestericher
JEFFREY OESTERICHER
Assistant United States Attorney
